definition: Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
Serbia/Serbian/abbr. for 塞爾維亞|塞尔维亚[Sai1 er3 wei2 ya4]
to stop up/to squeeze in/to stuff/cork/stopper
to stop up/to stuff/to cope with
that/those/then (in that case)/commonly pr. [nei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing

sentences.english: The aeroplane landed us at the airport in Barcelona.
sentences.chinese: 飞机把我们降落在巴塞罗那机场。

sentences.english: I love to play in Rome and Barcelona and I think Arsenal has a nice stadium too.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢在罗马和巴塞罗那比赛，阿森纳的主场也很好。

sentences.english: Pacheco's transfer continued a trend of teenagers leaving Barcelona for the Premier League.
sentences.chinese: 帕切科的转会沿袭了巴塞罗那青少年出走英超的传统。

sentences.english: Hm. Located in Barcelona's architecturally stunning La Rambla neighborhood.
sentences.chinese: 嗯，位于巴塞罗那的著名建筑兰布拉大道附近。

sentences.english: He was though prepared to state that Hilario would be handed the goalkeeper's gloves for the Barcelona match.
sentences.chinese: 他认为准备让希拉里奥对阵巴塞罗那的比赛中首发。

sentences.english: However, Real Madrid are a great club as well, as they wear white like Santos - but Catalunya and Barcelona have a place in my heart.
sentences.chinese: 然而我的心中永远有加泰罗尼亚和巴塞罗那的位置。

sentences.english: One label that’s hot among fashion conscious is MIRO, and these trendy designs of clothing and shoes originate in Barcelona.
sentences.chinese: 这些鞋子和衣服的设计流行趋势来自巴塞罗那。

sentences.english: How is the football match between F. C. Barcelona and Real Madrid?
sentences.chinese: 巴塞罗那和皇家马德里的足球比赛怎么样？

sentences.english: Which would make Barcelona's lopsided win even more impressive.
sentences.chinese: 巴塞罗那一边倒的胜利是令人心服口服的。

sentences.english: What are the attractions of coming to Barcelona?
sentences.chinese: 巴塞罗那有什么吸引人的地方？

sentences.english: Like, if you want to go party and stuff, I would say Barcelona in Spain.
sentences.chinese: 你要是想去派对什么的，我建议去西班牙巴塞罗那。

sentences.english: Christmas lights illuminate the Diagonal Avenue in Barcelona, Spain.
sentences.chinese: 圣诞装饰灯照亮西班牙巴塞罗那的对角大街。

sentences.english: The second international conference on degrowth economics met recently in Barcelona.
sentences.chinese: 日前，第二次国际逆生长经济会议在巴塞罗那举行。

sentences.english: Barcellona is the last club that I played with before the end of my career.
sentences.chinese: 巴塞罗那是我在职业生涯最后效力的俱乐部。

sentences.english: Wai Lin Tse is a photographer based in Barcelona, Spain.
sentences.chinese: 万林策是来自西班牙巴塞罗那的摄影师。

sentences.english: Cobi — mascot of the 1992 Olympic Summer Games in Barcelona, Spain.
sentences.chinese: 1992年，西班牙巴塞罗那夏奥会吉祥物科比。

definition: variant of 馬德里|马德里[Ma3 de2 li3], Madrid
Barca (nickname for FC Barcelona)/Baza (town in Grenada, Spain)
Real Madrid soccer team/abbr. for 皇家馬德里|皇家马德里
Málaga, Spain/Malaga city in Iranian East Azerbaijan
Napoli, capital of Campania region of Italy/Naples
